resources.string:
After this page, you will be directed to shoes listing page. 

The page is an inventory list for all the shoes the store has. 

If there is new shoes in inventory, add the shoes by click the add button. 

After that, you require to input information about the shoes: shoe name, company name, shoe size, and description. 

Then, click Save, and the new shoe will be added into the shoes listing page. 

If you cancel the input, the new shoe will not be added, and you will be directed back into the shoe listing page.
